Kay Bailey Hutchison Kirsten Gillibrand of New York said in a statement Wednesday she's open to making improvements to the health care law, but the Republican repeal amendment amounted to "a political stunt." It would deny affordable health insurance to millions of families and eliminate important tax breaks for small businesses, Kirsten Gillibrand said. 2011 2:52 PM DALLAS( AP)-- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said.
